shortdesc.ph: Describes information about cached music resources.
Describes information about cached music resources.

plentry.pd: ID of the music resource, used to identify the resource.
Cache status of the music resource. See .
The identifier of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.

The cache status of the music resource:
MUSIC_CACHE_STATUS_TYPE_CACHED (0): The music resource is cached.
MUSIC_CACHE_STATUS_TYPE_CACHING (1): The music resource is being cached.
